message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice, $14,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I value this product highly. How about we meet in the middle at $12,500?
Alice, $12,500 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $11,500. Let's find a compromise.
